metadata.title: Dewangga Praxindo | DeFi Smart Contract Engineer
metadata.description: Smart contract engineer berpengalaman 3+ tahun. Bangun protokol DeFi yang secure di Ethereum, Arbitrum, dan Solana. Total TVL $50M+.

hero.greeting: Halo, saya Dewangga. Smart contract engineer yang fokus bangun protokol DeFi secure dengan

about.label: Yang Saya Kerjakan
about.title: Full-Stack DeFi Engineering
about.description: Fokus saya di smart contract dan protokol DeFi yang production-ready. Dari Solidity di Ethereum/Arbitrum sampai Rust di Solana — semua kode battle-tested dengan security practices lengkap: fuzz testing, invariant testing, dan persiapan audit.

defi.title: DeFi Engineering
defi.description: Leverage vaults, LP management, yield strategies. Udah handle protokol dengan TVL $50M+ di Arbitrum.

multichain.title: Multi-Chain
multichain.description: Ethereum, Arbitrum, Solana, Polygon, Base. Integrasi AAVE, Compound, Pendle, Uniswap.

security.title: Security First
security.description: Fuzz testing, invariant testing. Audited by PeckShield.

zk.title: ZK & Privacy
zk.description: Zero-knowledge proofs pakai Noir circuits. Privacy-preserving verification.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Web3
fullstack.description: React, Next.js, TypeScript. Dari smart contract sampai frontend yang polished.

products.label: Produk Digital
products.title: Produk
products.subtitle: Resource buat percepat journey Web3 kamu
products.secureCheckout: Checkout aman via Gumroad • Langsung dikirim

comingSoon.description: Lagi nyiapin produk digital buat bantu kamu di Web3. Template, guide, dan resource — coming soon.
